explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black short-sleeved T-shirt and black pants, with a red wristband on his left wrist, is riding a BMX bike. He is at the top of a tall red ramp, with green grass below.

[0-6] The man starts riding down, the perspective still from his first-person view, clearly showing his hands gripping the handlebars. He continues down, gradually gaining speed. The sides of the ramp are green grass, and at the end of the ramp is a large jump. He rides the BMX towards the jump, below which is a Nitro World Games billboard. The man soars into the air, lets go of the BMX, performs a backflip in mid-air, then catches the BMX and lands on a black ramp, continuing to ride down.
